description.narrative: The Civil Society Forum for the Rights of the Child, shortly designated (ROSC), has the mission of contributing to the coordinationand strengthening of a national movement of Civil Society Organizations involved in the area of children's rights, mobilizing resources, facilitating partnerships between actors committed to improving the integral and harmonious development of children in the National Agenda. With this project the ROSC intends to implement an activity related to Premature Marriage and Early Pregnancy. The main objectives are: i) Analyze the impact of premature marriages on the country's economic development (ii) Enhance the advocacy capacity of ROSC and CECAP member organizations, including community leaders in raising awareness, advocacy and advocacy for the sexual and reproductive rights of women, iii) Contribute to the adoption of a specific law against premature marriages iv) Expand debate on premarital marriages and early pregnancies among girls, favoring the use of new information and communication technologies to increase their awareness of their sexual and reproductive rights To be implemented in the provinces of Maputo, Sofala and Nampula, the project plans to reach a total of 600 people, 300 of which are civil society and decision-making bodies (members of parliament, government, etc.) and the other 300 girls from schools and communities.

participating-org.narrative: FÓRUM DA SOCIEDADE CIVIL PARA OS DI

The Civil Society Forum for Children's rights (ROSC) is an organization that aims to contribute to the coordination and strengthening of a national movement of civil society organizations working in the area of children's rights, mobilizing resources andfacilitating partnerships between actors with a view to the well-being of the child. The organization has among other strategic objectives: serve as the main advocacy vehicle for children's rights for the effective implementation and realization of theirrights; as well as to promote the production and sharing of information, experiences and relevant knowledge that contributes to the promotion and protection of the rights of the child. It is an organization of national scope, acting in the three regionsofthe Country, namely: South region: MAPUTO, GAZA, INHAMBANE; Central region: MANICA, SOFALA, TETE; and North: ZAMBÉZIA, NAMPULA AND NIASSA. ROSC is coordinating the actions of the National Campaign against Premature Marriages, hosting the Coalition for the elimination of premature marriage (CECAP). It is also coordinating the drafting of the Specific Law against premature marriages.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to basic social services

receiver-org.narrative: FÓRUM DA SOCIEDADE CIVIL PARA OS DI
